price: ߞߟߍ߬ߓߏߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߞߴߦߋ߲߬ ߞߙߎߞߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߘߊ߬ߘߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
